Catgeory of GL/ 1- Asset/2- Liability/3- Income/4- Expense/5- Contingent Asset/6- Contingent Liability/7 - Memo/8 - Position GL/9 - Position Equivalent GL
Customer Account or GL Account entry/G - GL/A - Customer Account
